ac4e246232cc2e13612fc02a0dcc4008.title: Buffer Rejiggers Its Open Salary Formula
ac4e246232cc2e13612fc02a0dcc4008.description: Buffer, a company known for its radical transparency, has reformed its salary algorithm that it uses to calculate the pay of its staff. It’s been several years since Buffer first published its salary list. The company also has an equity chart that anyone can read, and a revenue dashboard that you can use to track its performance. Read More

6b0d4dd9613704c8da64bae74bea9a9a.title: Diversifying Technology Education
6b0d4dd9613704c8da64bae74bea9a9a.description: We all know the tech industry has a diversity problem. The major tech companies have released their bleak workforce diversity numbers, and one year later most of them are unchanged. Obviously, this is not an easy problem to fix. A workforce of white males naturally develops unconscious bias, which then impacts everything else. It leads to a “brogrammer” culture, a Â hiring bias… Read More

99e1b21a854718d82ca92feed793a4f8.description: Square’s IPO came in hot, bouncing more than 40 percent in its first day of trading. Priced conservatively, the offering did what all IPOs must do to set a positive narrative: rise. In the ensuing days of trading, Square has slipped. Today, as TechCrunch reported, shares in Square fell for the third consecutive session. A good first day, it seems, does not a good first week make. Read More
99e1b21a854718d82ca92feed793a4f8.title: A Square Pop, And A Drop

   conservatively, the offering did what all IPOs must do to set a
   positive narrative: rise. In the ensuing days of trading, Square has

   third consecutive session. A good first day, it seems, does not a good
